name: 王伯雅
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:

Week 4 0319-0325	Unit 9
Week 5 0326-0401	Unit 9
Week 6 0402-0408	Day off
Week 7 0409-0415	Unit 10
Week 8 0416-0422	Unit 10
Week 9 0423-0429	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
Week 10 0430-0506	Unit 11
Week 11 0507-0513	Unit 11
Week 12 0514-0520	Unit 12
Week 13 0521-0527	Unit 12
Week 14 0528-0603	 Review
Week 15 0604-0610	Project Discussion
Week 16 0611-0617	Group Presentation
Week 17 0618-0624	0618 day off textbook exam
Week 18 0625-0701	Schoolwide Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Class attendance (15%) 
	 Quiz and in-class participation (20%)
	 Final Project (20%: within-group evaluation 10%)
	 Exams (45%): Textbook Exam 15% +Midterm 15% +Final 15%
